altername_name: いくぜっ！源さん ～夕焼け大工物語～
name: Hammerin' Hero
overview: Hammerin' Hero is a side-scrolling action game. The hero must save his village from the yakuza Kuroki. A friend Kanna helps him by preparing meals to restore his health. The main character can wear eight different suits to adapt to situations and defeat enemies.
